1: ה֥וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Woe</n> הַחֹֽקְקִ֖ים <sup>2710 </sup> <n>unto them that decree</n> חִקְקֵי־ <sup>2711 </sup> <n>decrees</n> אָ֑וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>unrighteous</n> וּֽמְכַתְּבִ֥ים <sup>3789 </sup> <n>and that write</n> עָמָ֖ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>grievousness</n> כִּתֵּֽבוּ׃ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>[which] they have prescribed</n>
2: לְהַטּ֤וֹת <sup>5186 </sup> <n>To turn aside</n> מִדִּין֙ <sup>1779 </sup> <n>from judgment</n> דַּלִּ֔ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the needy</n> וְלִגְזֹ֕ל <sup>1497 </sup> <n>and to take away</n> מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>the right</n> עֲנִיֵּ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>from the poor</n> עַמִּ֑י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> לִהְי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אַלְמָנוֹת֙ <sup>490 </sup> <n>that widows</n> שְׁלָלָ֔ם <sup>7998 </sup> <n>may be their prey</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְתוֹמִ֖ים <sup>3490 </sup> <n>the fatherless</n> יָבֹֽזּוּ׃ <sup>962 </sup> <n>and [that] they may rob</n>
3: וּמַֽה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>now what</n> תַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And what will ye do</n> לְי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> פְּקֻדָּ֔ה <sup>6486 </sup> <n>of visitation</n> וּלְשׁוֹאָ֖ה <sup>7722 </sup> <n>and in the desolation</n> מִמֶּרְחָ֣ק <sup>4801 </sup> <n>afar</n> תָּב֑וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>[which] shall come</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִי֙ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>will you</n> תָּנ֣וּסוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>flee</n> לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <sup>5833 </sup> <n>help-ed</n> וְאָ֥נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>where</n> תַעַזְב֖וּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>leave</n> כְּבוֹדְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>glorious</n>
4: בִּלְתִּ֤י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>Without me they shall</n> כָרַע֙ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>bow down</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>among</n> אַסִּ֔יר <sup>616 </sup> <n>under the prisoners</n> וְתַ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>among</n> הֲרוּגִ֖ים <sup>2026 </sup> <n>under the slain</n> יִפֹּ֑לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and they shall fall</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is not turned away</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>For all this his anger</n> וְע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> יָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>but his hand</n> נְטוּיָֽה׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>[is] stretched out still</n> ס
5: ה֥וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>O</n> אַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>Assyrian</n> שֵׁ֣בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the rod</n> אַפִּ֑י <sup>639 </sup> <n>of mine anger</n> וּמַטֶּה־ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>and the staff</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>whose</n> בְיָדָ֖ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in their hand</n> זַעְמִֽי׃ <sup>2195 </sup> <n>is mine indignation</n>
6: בְּג֤וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> חָנֵף֙ <sup>2611 </sup> <n>him against an hypocritical</n> אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔נּוּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I will send</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and against the people</n> עֶבְרָתִ֖י <sup>5678 </sup> <n>of my wrath</n> אֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>will I give him a charge</n> לִשְׁלֹ֤ל <sup>7997 </sup> <n>to take</n> שָׁלָל֙ <sup>7998 </sup> <n>the spoil</n> וְלָבֹ֣ז <sup>962 </sup> <n>and to take</n> בַּ֔ז <sup>957 </sup> <n>the prey</n> [וּלְשִׂימֹו כ] (וּלְשׂוּמֹ֥ו <sup>7760 </sup> <n>appoint</n> ק) מִרְמָ֖ס <sup>4823 </sup> <n>trample</n> כְּחֹ֥מֶר <sup>2563 </sup> <n>like the mire</n> חוּצֽוֹת׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>of the streets</n>
7: וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> כֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יְדַמֶּ֔ה <sup>1819 </sup> <n>Howbeit he meaneth</n> וּלְבָב֖וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>not so neither doth his heart</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> כֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יַחְשֹׁ֑ב <sup>2803 </sup> <n>think</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>rather</n> לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> בִּלְבָב֔וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>so but [it is] in his heart</n> וּלְהַכְרִ֥ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and cut off</n> גּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מְעָֽט׃ <sup>4592 </sup> <n>not a few</n>
8: כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יֹאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For he saith</n> הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> שָׂרַ֛י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>[Are] not my princes</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>altogether</n> מְלָכִֽים׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n>
9: הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>like</n> כְּכַרְכְּמִ֖ישׁ <sup>3751 </sup> <n>Carchemish</n> כַּלְנ֑וֹ <sup>3641 </sup> <n>[Is] not Calno</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>like</n> כְאַרְפַּד֙ <sup>774 </sup> <n>Arpad</n> חֲמָ֔ת <sup>2574 </sup> <n>Hamath</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> כְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <sup>1834 </sup> <n>Damascus</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>Samaria</n>
10: כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> מָצְאָ֣ה <sup>4672 </sup> <n>hath found</n> יָדִ֔י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>As my hand</n> לְמַמְלְכֹ֖ת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>the kingdoms</n> הָאֱלִ֑יל <sup>457 </sup> <n>of the idols</n> וּפְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6456 </sup> <n>and whose graven images</n> מִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>did excel them of Jerusalem</n> וּמִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>and of Samaria</n>
11: הֲלֹ֗א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>not</n> עָשִׂ֛יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Shall I not as I have done</n> לְשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>unto Samaria</n> וְלֶאֱלִילֶ֑יהָ <sup>457 </sup> <n>and her idols</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so do</n> לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>to Jerusalem</n> וְלַעֲצַבֶּֽיהָ׃ <sup>6091 </sup> <n>images</n> ס
12: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be that</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יְבַצַּ֤ע <sup>1214 </sup> <n>hath performed</n> אֲדֹנָי֙ <sup>136 </sup> <n>Wherefore it shall come to pass [that] when the Lord</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַֽעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>his whole work</n> בְּהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon mount</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>and on Jerusalem</n> אֶפְקֹ֗ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>I will punish</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פְּרִי־ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n> גֹ֙דֶל֙ <sup>1433 </sup> <n>of the stout</n> לְבַ֣ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>heart</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> אַשּׁ֔וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>of Assyria</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and the glory</n> ר֥וּם <sup>7312 </sup> <n>of his high</n> עֵינָֽיו׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>looks</n>
13: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For he saith</n> בְּכֹ֤חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>By the strength</n> יָדִי֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of my hand</n> עָשִׂ֔יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I have done</n> וּבְחָכְמָתִ֖י <sup>2451 </sup> <n>[it] and by my wisdom</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נְבֻנ֑וֹתִי <sup>995 </sup> <n>for I am prudent</n> וְאָסִ֣יר ׀ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and I have removed</n> גְּבוּלֹ֣ת <sup>1367 </sup> <n>the bounds</n> עַמִּ֗ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> [וַעֲתִידֹתֵיהֶם כ] (וַעֲתוּדֹֽותֵיהֶם֙ <sup>6264 </sup> <n>treasures</n> ק) שׁוֹשֵׂ֔תִי <sup>8154 </sup> <n>and have robbed</n> וְאוֹרִ֥יד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and I have put down</n> כַּאבִּ֖יר <sup>47 </sup> <n>man</n> יוֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>the inhabitants</n>
14: וַתִּמְצָ֨א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>hath found</n> כַקֵּ֤ן ׀ <sup>7064 </sup> <n>as a nest</n> יָדִי֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>And my hand</n> לְחֵ֣יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>the riches</n> הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> וְכֶאֱסֹף֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and as one gathereth</n> בֵּיצִ֣ים <sup>1000 </sup> <n>eggs</n> עֲזֻב֔וֹת <sup>5800 </sup> <n>[that are] left</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>all the earth</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אָסָ֑פְתִּי <sup>622 </sup> <n>have I gathered</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נֹדֵ֣ד <sup>5074 </sup> <n>and there was none that moved</n> כָּנָ֔ף <sup>3671 </sup> <n>the wing</n> וּפֹצֶ֥ה <sup>6475 </sup> <n>or opened</n> פֶ֖ה <sup>6310 </sup> <n>the mouth</n> וּמְצַפְצֵֽף׃ <sup>6850 </sup> <n>or peeped</n>
15: הֲיִתְפָּאֵר֙ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>boast</n> הַגַּרְזֶ֔ן <sup>1631 </sup> <n>Shall the axe</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הַחֹצֵ֣ב <sup>2672 </sup> <n>itself against him that heweth</n> בּ֑וֹ אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> יִתְגַּדֵּ֤ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>magnify</n> הַמַּשּׂוֹר֙ <sup>4883 </sup> <n>therewith? [or] shall the saw</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> מְנִיפ֔וֹ <sup>5130 </sup> <n>itself against him that shaketh</n> כְּהָנִ֥יף <sup>5130 </sup> <n>should shake</n> שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>it? as if the rod</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מְרִימָ֔יו <sup>7311 </sup> <n>[itself] against them that lift it up</n> כְּהָרִ֥ים <sup>7311 </sup> <n>should lift up</n> מַטֶּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>[or] as if the staff</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> עֵֽץ׃ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>[itself as if it were] no wood</n>
16: לָ֠כֵן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> יְשַׁלַּ֨ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>send</n> הָאָד֜וֹן <sup>113 </sup> <n>Therefore shall the Lord</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the GOD</n> צְבָא֛וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> בְּמִשְׁמַנָּ֖יו <sup>4924 </sup> <n>among his fat ones</n> רָז֑וֹן <sup>7332 </sup> <n>leanness</n> וְתַ֧חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> כְּבֹד֛וֹ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and under his glory</n> יֵקַ֥ד <sup>3344 </sup> <n>he shall kindle</n> יְקֹ֖ד <sup>3350 </sup> <n>a burning</n> כִּיק֥וֹד <sup>3350 </sup> <n>A burning</n> אֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>like the burning of a fire</n>
17: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> אֽוֹר־ <sup>216 </sup> <n>And the light</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>shall be for a fire</n> וּקְדוֹשׁ֖וֹ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and his Holy One</n> לְלֶהָבָ֑ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>for a flame</n> וּבָעֲרָ֗ה <sup>1197 </sup> <n>and it shall burn</n> וְאָֽכְלָ֛ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>and devour</n> שִׁית֥וֹ <sup>7898 </sup> <n>his thorns</n> וּשְׁמִיר֖וֹ <sup>8068 </sup> <n>and his briers</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n>
18: וּכְב֤וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>the glory</n> יַעְרוֹ֙ <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of his forest</n> וְכַרְמִלּ֔וֹ <sup>3759 </sup> <n>and of his fruitful field</n> מִנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>both soul</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בָּשָׂ֖ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and body</n> יְכַלֶּ֑ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>And shall consume</n> וְהָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּמְסֹ֥ס <sup>4549 </sup> <n>fainteth</n> נֹסֵֽס׃ <sup>5264 </sup> <n>lift up as an ensign</n>
19: וּשְׁאָ֥ר <sup>7605 </sup> <n>And the rest</n> עֵ֛ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>of the trees</n> יַעְר֖וֹ <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of his forest</n> מִסְפָּ֣ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>shall be few</n> יִֽהְי֑וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וְנַ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>that a child</n> יִכְתְּבֵֽם׃ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>may write</n> פ
